name: Down Under (GavinCraft Dev Team)
description:
REMEMBER: This Game is in early access and is constantly being worked on!

Beta Version 1.1!

There Are Many Bug Fixes And Changes, The "Early Ending" Bug Has Been Fixed. You Can Now Restart The Game Without Having To Restart The Application Additionally, The Minecraft Death Screen Has Been Removed. The Attack Button Is Now Left Click! Finally Everything has Been Scaled Up To Match The Player.

This Game Was Made By A Development Team Check Them Out!

Credits (Discord):

GavinCraft#3888 (Main Developer)

Life story#2630 (Art)

crayon#0666 (Music)
